text: Predappio is a comune in the Province of Forlì-Cesena in the Emilia-Romagna region in Italy. The town is the birthplace and resting place of Benito Mussolini, dictator of Italy from 1922 to 1943. == Twin towns == Predappio is twinned with: * Breuna, Germany * Kenderes, Hungary == References == Category:Settlements in Forlì-Cesena
title: Predappio
